summary: Completed testing of ColdIQ Pro tier features - Performance Tracking and Sequence Analysis. All tests passed. Backend APIs working correctly. Frontend pages load with proper data and tier-gating.
passed_tests: Backend: Pro user login successful (pro@test.com / Test1234!)
Backend: Free user login successful (free@test.com / Test1234!)
Backend: /api/analysis/history returns {analyses: [], total: N} format correctly
Backend: /api/analysis/sequence returns overall_score, key_insight, issues, email_scores, recommendations
Backend: Sequence analysis blocked for free tier (403 - 'Sequence analysis requires Pro or higher plan')
Frontend: Pro user Performance page (/performance) loads with charts and data
Frontend: Performance page shows Avg Score, Avg Response, Best Score, Analyses stats
Frontend: Performance page time range filters (7D, 30D, 90D) work correctly
Frontend: Performance page shows Score Trend, Response Rate Trend, Open Rate Trend charts
Frontend: Pro user Sequence page (/sequence) loads with multi-email form
Frontend: Sequence page shows 'YOUR SEQUENCE (2 EMAILS)' with Add Email button
Frontend: Sequence page has Initial Outreach and Follow-up #1 email sections
Frontend: Sequence page has 'ANALYZE FULL SEQUENCE' button
Frontend: Free user sees locked state on Performance page with 'Pro Feature' and 'UPGRADE TO PRO' CTA
Frontend: Free user sees locked state on Sequence page with 'Pro Feature' and 'UPGRADE TO PRO' CTA
Frontend: Sidebar shows PRO badges for Sequences and Performance menu items
seed_data_creation: Used existing test accounts from previous iterations

mocked_apis_list: SMS OTP via send_sms_otp() - OTPs logged to console and stored in mock_sms collection

context_for_next_testing_agent: Pro tier features (Performance Tracking and Sequence Analysis) tested successfully. Performance page shows historical analysis trends with Recharts charts (Score Trend, Response Rate Trend, Open Rate Trend). Time range filters (7D, 30D, 90D) work correctly. Sequence Analysis page allows multi-email input (2-5 emails) and returns AI-generated analysis with overall_score, key_insight, issues, email_scores, and recommendations. Free users correctly see locked state with 'Pro Feature' message and 'UPGRADE TO PRO' CTA on both pages. Bug fix in Performance.jsx (res.data?.analyses || []) confirmed working.
